peregrine.split
Class InputSplit

java.lang.Object
  peregrine.split.InputSplit
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable
public class InputSplit
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable

A region of a file which has a deterministic size and ends on a record boundary. This way we can parse the file easily. We can also still use a ChannelBuffer/ByteBuffer as a backing since we can make it each one less than 2GB but aggregate them on files larger than 2GB.
